name: Boogeyman (itch) (AlessioCarl)
description:
The concept of the game is very simple: you control the boogeyman and your goal is to pass the boogeyman inside his door. 

This is a solo game project, i have use some free assets take from mixamo (joe, main character) ,other take from sketchfab and simple form done with Probuilder,
Boogeyman 3d model is take from internet (i missed the link) and re-worked by Matteo Scarcella (https://www.instagram.com/sid_3dartist/) .

Ost: A_Dark_Time_-_David_Fesliyan
Sound effects: me, with Fl Studio.

I had also thought of a story: an investigator who had a strange case on an abandoned house where the boogeyman lives.

Give me some feedbacks.
